div.p: The culture at Lift For Life Academy is nurturing, compassionate and challenging. It feels like family and our priority is to ensure that all students are proficient in core subjects, are able to graduate with a strong academic foundation and then assist them in developing a life plan beyond graduation.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat button-xlarge button-default button-4 fusion-button-default-span fusion-button-default-type

div.p: In light of concern about COVID-19 and wanting to ensure the health and safety of our students, families and staff, we are currently conducting online learning for all students. If you have concerns or questions about the schoolwork, please contact the individual teachers or the principal of your student’s school. Thank you and be safe!

div.class: fusion-column content-box-column content-box-column content-box-column-2 col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 fusion-content-box-hover

div.h2: Lift For Life Delivers Meals to Students

div.p: If our families at LFLA are in need of food, please complete this form and we will conduct food dropoffs to your home.

div.class: fusion-column content-box-column content-box-column content-box-column-3 col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 fusion-content-box-hover content-box-column-last content-box-column-last-in-row

div.p: We are now having a virtual 10th Annual Celebrating Success fashion show. Look for emails in the near future with student videos showcasing their outfits and check out the unique Silent Auction items right here. More items to come!

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_2 fusion-builder-column-4 fusion-one-half fusion-column-first 1_2
fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_2 fusion-builder-column-5 fusion-one-half fusion-column-last 1_2

div.p: Our school calendar shows all our upcoming events.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-default-size button-default button-5 fusion-button-default-span fusion-button-default-type

div.class: fusion-fullwidth fullwidth-box fusion-builder-row-5 hundred-percent-fullwidth non-hundred-percent-height-scrolling fusion-equal-height-columns
fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_4 fusion-builder-column-6 fusion-one-fourth fusion-column-first 1_4

i.class: fb-icon-element-1 fb-icon-element fontawesome-icon fa-graduation-cap fas circle-yes

div.p: Lift For Life Academy requires 26 credit hours to graduate while the State of Missouri only requires 24. We also offer several challenging and career-oriented courses such as engineering, coding, fashion design and music. For information about MOCAP, please click here.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-default-size button-custom button-6 fusion-button-default-span fusion-button-default-type

i.class: fb-icon-element-2 fb-icon-element fontawesome-icon fa-book-open fas circle-yes

div.p: Lift For Life Academy wants to ensure that all students and families have access to all available resources to enhance the students learning experiences.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-default-size button-custom button-7 fusion-button-default-span fusion-button-default-type

i.class: fb-icon-element-3 fb-icon-element fontawesome-icon fa-basketball-ball fas circle-yes

div.p: Our athletic program is broad, offering football, basketball, volleyball, and wrestling. Our coaches and physical education teachers have the skills and leadership qualities to provide a positive, team-building atmosphere for our student athletes.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-default-size button-custom button-8 fusion-button-default-span fusion-button-default-type

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_4 fusion-builder-column-9 fusion-one-fourth fusion-column-last 1_4

i.class: fb-icon-element-4 fb-icon-element fontawesome-icon fa-clipboard-list fas circle-yes

div.p: All youth in the city of St. Louis are welcome to enroll at Lift For Life Academy. With a student population of just under 600, we offer a safe,family environment with a stimulating curriculum and a robust athletic program.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-default-size button-custom button-9 fusion-button-default-span fusion-button-default-type
